title: Blissful Hook
description: Everyone knew the rules. Gracie Hutton was off-limits.But Tyler's never been one to follow rules.And now she's about to become his ultimate sin.Tyler Bateman doesn't know what easy means. He's never had an easy day in his damn life. Everything he has he's worked for. Blood, sweat, and tears.Hockey is his escape, a passion he never knew he could possess. He wants to succeed. He wants to prove that he's worth something.He wasn't expecting her to matter. He didn't want her to. But she had other plans, and now his best friend's sister is about to ruin his life.And he might just let her.
author: Hannah Cowan
